there is nothing bad about this game whatsoever, it is, as some would say, perfect

if not the greatest game of all time, one of the greatest. great AI, great weapons, solid shooting mechanics, great story. mildly replayable, but who cares since it's on sale for ~$2. you are doing yourself and 10 hours of your life a disservice (excluding the average HL2E1 and excellent HL2E2 expansions) if you haven't played this game. 

i honestly replay it every time i get a new PC, because pushing the aging engine just a little more is still satisfying.
very nice.

I'm just gonna get to the point, this game is great, its basically the same as getting all green lights on your way home from work, lemme explain.

For starters, even though this is a 2004 game, the graphics are amazing! They even still hold up today, and the campaign feels real because unlike other campaign games because instead of sitting through a cut scene you get to experience it yourself. The campaign even has a little humor here and there which reliefs you from shooting combine, getting blown up, or being chased down by 10 fast zombies. And the game play flows smooth like butter which makes it all the more enjoyable. And with the new physics engine the game feels even more realistic. And the game never gets boring since you always have something to do.

So in all, I'd give this game a 10/10 and I definetly recommend it.
game
good game, good graphics, good story.

A game like none other. It manages to take you on a true adventure in just under a day. You'll visit City-17, the canals, an abandoned mining town, a highway, a high-security prison, and the Combine Citadel itself.

Combine (haha) this with the storytelling and beautiful graphics, and imagine what it would've been like to play this for the first time in 2004.

A great sequel to a great game.

Gelmiş geçmiş en efsanevi fps oyunlardan biri. Çocukken 2002 gibi ilk oyununu oynamıştım bitirememiştim.  Ben bitirmeye çalışana kadar 2004'de ikinci oyunu duyuruldu. Daha sonradan 2006 gibi bir şekilde ilk oyununu bitirmiştim. Sonra ise ikinci oyunun demosunu oynama fırsatı bulmuştum 2 gün sürmüştü inmesi garip gelmişti evreni, black mesa'dan eser yok gibiydi neyse efendim çeşitli yollarla tam sürümünü indirip defalarca bitirdiğim half life ve serilerini bu sefer tüm seriyi satın alarak yeniden başladım. Hey gidi maziler gözümde canlandı. Gordon freeman reis yıllardır gözümüz yollarda 3. oyununu geçtik artık episode three'yi bekliyoruz... :-( Buradan steam mucidinden valveye sesleniyorum Allah belanı vermesin CS GO'dan döndün köşeyi bizide yetim bıraktın bu eserden :-(

Ich denke, die meisten kennen die Half-Life Reihe. Aber jeder der es noch nicht kennt, der muss es unbedingt gespielt haben. Egal welcher Teil, die müssen alle gespielt werden :). Ich habe es damals schon als junger heranwachsender gespielt wo es zum ersten mal veröffentlicht wurde, überzeugt mich vor allen wegen dem stimmigen Art Design und der für damalige Zeiten guten Story, spannende Momente, viele Rätsel, viele Schießereien, es gibt viele verschiedene Gegnertypen, es wird nicht langweilig und bleibt bis zum Ende auf einer Linie. Die Schwierigkeitsgrade sind fair eingestellt. Jeder Gamer muss es meiner Meinung nach einmal gespielt haben und ich packe es heutzutage immer wieder mal aus und spiele es ne Runde :)
If you haven't played it you should

Muhteşem bir devam oyun! Half-Life 1'in sonunda G-Man'in açtığı portala girdikten sonrasını konu alıyor. Yine çıkış tarihinin ilerisinde başarılı bir yapım olmuş. Hikaye anlatımı ve oynanış gayet güzel; zaten Half-Life serisi için kötü bir şey demek mümkün değil. Derin bir konusu olan, bol aksiyonlu FPS türünde bir oyun arıyorsanız ve henüz Half-Life ile tanışmadıysanız, daha fazla beklemeyin. Pişman olmayacaksınız.

Un des meilleurs FPS jamais réalisé, n'a jamais mal vieillit.
Il faut y jouer c'est tout !

Вот и я теперь прошел вторую халву. Заинтересовался ли я в дальнейшем сюжете? Безусловно! Описать моё 9-часовое приключение можно многими словами. Хочу сказать вам просто-Этот шедевр нельзя пропускать, кто бы мог подумать что столь топовая лицевая анимация будет доступна уже в 2004 году? Графика по сей день слегка устарела но смотреть на неё еще можно. Иногда я замечал достаточно красивые картины. Про сюжет могу сказать одно он ах**телен!!! Пройдите и всё сами поймете. Вот так кратенько но содержательно.

Remember the past

I fail to see the reason behind the mass appeal of this game. It might have been an amazing experience back in 2004, but now, I don't think it's anything exceptional. The game felt extremely stretched out at some points, takes roughly 13 hours to finish on average, and while 13 hours isn't a lot of time, it felt like most of it wasn't necessary. I didn't find the plot nor characters to be anything great, I think it was all bland for the most part. The problem I have with this game is that some chapters feel great and well made, and some (most of them) are just extremely repetitve. I found Half-Life 2 to be pretty boring and annoying at times, but some things about it are good, such as the gameplay, it's just amazing, I really like the movement and gravity gun. The graphics still pretty much hold up, they're still very decent. I think what I liked mostly about the game was the Source engine, but the game itself was very meh.
